name: Orc: Arena of Time
description:
Help "Orc", the brave orc, navigate the precarious Arena of Time and prove to all what a mighty adventurer "Orc" is!

---

A small game made for the 5K Raylib Gamejam. 

Technologies used:
  • Raylib
  • mRuby
  • FelFlame ECS
Credit:

Code: _Tradam and argo

Music:

 Highway 1 - Retro Gaming Version [Royalty Free] Music provided and produced by LonePeakMusic, Video Link : https://youtu.be/waaxFLLnRXgw

Final Lap - Retro Gaming Version [Royalty Free] Music provided and produced by LonePeak, Music Video Link : https://youtu.be/rakHRNkcGgo

All other audio was created by using Audacity and rFXGen

Textures: 

General textures by https://analogstudios.itch.io with additional edits made by _Tradam

Button textures by https://mounirtohami.itch.io
